author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
see: https://indico.cern.ch/event/562065/cntributions/2270369/
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII simulation
- **RunII Ideal scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_design_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_design_v5) as [81X_mcRun2_design_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_design_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_design_v5/81X_mcRun2_design_v4): 
  - updated SiPixel dynamic inefficiency for 2016 data (high PU)
- **RunII CRAFT scenario** : [81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5) as [81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v5/81X_mcRun2cosmics_startup_peak_v4): 
  - updated EcalChannelStatus (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated RPC noise and efficiency
  - updated SiPixel dynamic inefficiency for 2016 data (high PU)
  - updated Pixel channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Strip channel status (as in Aug 2016)
- **RunII Asymptotic scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5) as [81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v5/81X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v4): 
  - updated EcalChannelStatus (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated RPC noise and efficiency
  - updated SiPixel dynamic inefficiency for 2016 data (high PU)
  - updated Pixel channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Strip channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Tracker Alignment fixing z-shrinkage effect 
- **RunII Startup scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_startup_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_v5) as [81X_mcRun2_startup_v4](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_v4) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_startup_v5/81X_mcRun2_startup_v4): 
  - updated EcalChannelStatus (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated RPC noise and efficiency
  - updated SiPixel dynamic inefficiency for 2016 data (high PU)
  - updated Pixel channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Strip channel status (as in Aug 2016)
- **RunII Heavy Ions scenario** : [81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5) as [81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v3](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v3) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v5/81X_mcRun2_HeavyIon_v3): 
  - updated EcalChannelStatus (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated RPC noise and efficiency
  - updated SiPixel dynamic inefficiency for 2016 data (high PU)
  - updated Pixel channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Strip channel status (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated Tracker Alignment fixing z-shrinkage effect 
## Upgrade
- **PhaseI realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9) as [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v8) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v9/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v8): 
  - updated EcalChannelStatus (as in Aug 2016)
  - updated RPC noise and efficiency  
  - updated Strip channel status (as in Aug 2016)
title: MC updates for trancheIV
